resources.string: NIT Agartala News and Notification app

This application has been designed to facilitate staying up to date with News and Events that are posted on NITA Website. It's a work in progress and we plan to improve and add new features. 

The source code for this app is open sourced at https://github.com/anandbibek/NITA_Notifications . 
Any feedback and contribution towards this project are most welcome.

Suman Deb, Asst. Prof, CSE
Guide and Coordinator 

Ananda Bibek Ray, M.Tech, CSE (2015-17)
Lead developer
